thread.title: CACI Chief Operating Officer John Mengucci Selected to FCW’s 2018 Federal 100

author: cnbc.com
title: CACI Chief Operating Officer John Mengucci Selected to FCW’s 2018 Federal 100
text:
ARLINGTON, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- CACI International Inc ( NYSE: CACI ) announced today that FCW has named Chief Operating Officer (COO) John Mengucci to its 2018 Federal 100 (Fed100), an elite list of government and industry leaders whose vision, passion, and innovation have impacted and transformed federal IT. Mr. Mengucci will receive his recognition at the 29 th Annual Federal 100 Awards Gala on March 22 nd in Washington, DC and will be featured in an upcoming issue of FCW magazine.
A proven industry leader, Mr. Mengucci was selected to the Fed100 for his strategic leadership, insight into national security, and keen customer understanding, all of which were integral to CACI’s record-setting FY17 financial performance and key to positioning the company for continued growth. In 2017 Mr. Mengucci assumed an expanded role as COO, developing an accelerated growth plan through organic investments and transformational mergers and acquisitions, managing the company’s operational policies, overseeing human resources and recruiting, and leading CACI’s mergers and acquisitions integration activities. Mr. Mengucci is the architect of CACI’s market-based strategy and focus on pursuing larger, more complex and solutions-based contracts on programs of long-term value to its customers, directly leading to increased revenue, growth from new business, expanded market reach, and an enhanced emphasis on innovative solutions.
According to Mr. Mengucci, “I’m honored to be chosen among this select group of accomplished leaders on FCW’s Federal 100. On behalf of all the talented people at CACI, I accept this award in recognition of their sustained commitment to delivering innovative solutions and services that advance our customers’ capabilities and address their most compelling challenges.”
Ken Asbury , CACI’s President and Chief Executive Officer added, “John Mengucci’s selection to the Federal 100 is an affirmation of his innovative leadership and outstanding contributions to CACI’s continued success. We congratulate John on this honor and thank him for his dedication to serving our customers with ethics, integrity, and the strongest commitment to excellence in support of the nation’s highest priorities.”
CACI provides information solutions and services in support of national security missions and government transformation for Intelligence, Defense, and Federal Civilian customers. A Fortune World’s Most Admired Company, CACI is a member of the Fortune 1000 Largest Companies, the Russell 2000 Index, and the S&P SmallCap600 Index. CACI’s sustained commitment to ethics and integrity defines its corporate culture and drives its success. With approximately 18,700 employees worldwide, CACI provides dynamic career opportunities for military veterans and industry professionals to support the nation’s most critical missions.
